name: Dodge the Asteroids
description:
Made from "Your First Game" tutorial provided Godot.

Was going to be a Pac-man inspired game, where you could collect Powerups, as the moon, to eat all the ghost-rocks! However, there was no time (or lack of experience) to make any of it. Next time! Still, great to be part of a Game Jam, beginners or not :)

WASD or Arrow Keys to move.

Font: Symtext. Pixels put together in Pyxel Edit
